composition_basics::markdown_card_1::tex: Gufata ifoto bikura vyinshi mugisata co gusiga amarangi. Amafoto meza aba akozwe kuburyo uwafashwe icafotowe neza, nayo intumbero y’ifoto iratomoye.Ibararyiza n’isano hagati y’ibiboneka mw’ifoto, ivyo abantu bashoka babona ubwambere ni ngirakamaro mugukora ifoto. Uko umuco wakoreshejwe ni ngirakamaro cane.
composition_basics::preview_card_0::head: Ni izihe ngingo ngenderwako z’ifoto ikoze neza?
composition_basics::preview_card_1::head: Ikiganiro n’umuhinga afata ifoto avuga gukoresha ibigize ifoto mu rugendo
composition_basics::quiz_card_3::questio: Ni ikihe muri ibi ari ingingo shingiro y’ifoto ikoze neza? (inyishu zishobora kuba nyishi)
composition_basics::quiz_card_2::questio: Ego / oya: Isanamu ibwirizwa kuba itunganijwe neza.uburyo bwo kubikora ukorera kumuntu umwe ukamushira hagati neza.

Iyo mufashe ifoto nko mumunsi mukuru ningombwa kumenya ko abanyagihugu batabona uko vyose vyagenze.Nti bamenya ivyo utaberetse.  
![Akarorero k’ifoto yerekana n’igikorwa.](3.jpg)  
Abamenyeshamakuru beza ntibafata gusa ivyabaye mumasanamu, biyumvira ibikenewe biboneka bitanga kandi bikerekana ahabereye urubanza n’icatumye ubifotora. hari ibishoboka guhinduka. Ivyo bibasaba  kubona agahaze, n’abamenyeshamakuru babahinga ni uko.

composition_basics::markdown_card_10::te:
## Ntimwibagire  
• Kwiyunvira kumasanamu  
• gupanga ibija mw’isanamu kugira mutange inkuru inyura kandi yigisha.  
• Gerageza gufata amasanamu meza ifoto nziza itwara umwanya.  
• Ni ugutegura mukibaza ukuntu muronka isanamu nziza zo gukora inkuru zituma abatira banezerwa.
composition_basics::markdown_card_8::tex:
Icanyuma kigize ifoto nziza ni umwanya. Amafoto meza afatwa muduce tw’umusegonda.Mugihe ibigize ifoto bikwiye, igikorwa co gufata amafoto nico kiba gisigaye gikomeye. Ivyo bavyita umwanya wigikorwa. Amafoto meza kenshi ni ayihutiwe. Ivyo kenshi bishirwaho mukwegeranya ibikubikuru bikenewe mwifoto, hanyuma ukarindira umwanya mwiza wo gufata ifoto.  
Hakenewe ubwitonzi mugufata ifoto nukwiyunvira kukuntu mushora gutanga inkuru musigura, bifata umwanya muremure gushika kumwanya wo gufata amafoto meza.
composition_basics::markdown_card_5::tex:
![Akarorero k’ifoto ibona neza, igereranye mukubona](9.png)  
##kugerekeranya  
Ikindi gikomeye ni “Gusumbasumbanya”.Isanamu yambere igereranya ifasha kuvuga vyinshi biboneka mw’ifoto.Mushobora guhitamwo gushira ico mufotora umurimyi/mirima yanse kubera uruzuba utamushira ibubanfu n’umurima wiwe inyuma.Ivyo vyerekana ishusho ibonerana yico wafotoye (imbere) nayo ibindi  bikwiye mw’isanamu(inyuma).
composition_basics::markdown_card_0::tex:
## Muri ico cigwa muzokwiga:  
• Amazina atomoye  
• Ibikurukuru mubigize ifoto  
• Regle des tiers isigura iki mw’ifoto  
• Bakora gute”superposition mw’ifoto  
• Bisigura iki”travailler sur les bords”  
• Impanuro ngo mufate ifoto mutekanye

##Umutekano  
Ibuka ko utegerezwa kwitaho umutekano wawe nuwufotora imbere ya vyose. Umumenyeshamakuru ashobora guhagarara kumpera z’ikibanza hagoye.Ufata ifoto akeneye kwegera ngo afate ifoto neza. Abamenyeshamakuru imisi yose bafatirahamwe umutekano nigi kenewe ngo afate isanamu nziza.

## Gukoresha inkengera.  
Mw’ifoto ikozwe neza iforoma n’amakuru ahambaye birafashanya.Ibiganza vy’iteka ntibabikaza uko ariko kose.uwutwara abakozi arinico aterera mw’isanamu ntibamukatimwo kabiri kunkengera ya cadre. Abahinga mugufotora bavyita Igikorwa c'inkengera. Amaforoma aca cadre,inzugi canke ibiti n’ibindi,vy’amabara akaze,babikoresha ngo berekane aho inkengera ya cadre igarukira bigafasha ngo biboneke muriyo.
composition_basics::quiz_card_1::choices: Gutunganya inkuru kuva kuntango ngo ushire vyiza mw’isanamu.
Gufata umwanya uhagije ngo uronke isanamu nziza.
